subject: Economy
question_en: What is money supply in economics?
explanation_en: Checkable Deposits are a type of money supply in economics, where individuals can demand their money to be paid by a bank. In Hindi, this can be explained as "भर्तिमान", known as "Checkable Deposits".
explanation_hi: भर्तिमान एक आईस्टोमेशन के एक प्रकार है, जहां व्यक्तियां bank से मैनेस्ट को ग्राह्यां की तैयारी विवरण है।
D: मैनेस्ट को ग्राह्यां की तैयारी विवरण है।
